name: Wolfenstein 3D
description: Uses the files from the Windows installer from GOG.
content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
- innoextract: https://lutris.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/tools/innoextract/innoextract-1.8-pre-x86_64.tar.gz
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/__support/app/dosbox_wolf3d.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: innoextract
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$installer"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/__support/app
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/__support/app
    src: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_wolf3d_single.conf
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/__support/app
    src: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_wolf3d.conf
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/__support/app/dosbox_wolf3d.conf
    key: aspect
    section: render
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/__support/app/dosbox_wolf3d.conf
    key: output
    section: sdl
    value: overlay
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/__support/app/dosbox_wolf3d.conf
    key: fullscreen
    section: sdl
    value: false
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/__support/app/dosbox_wolf3d.conf
    key: fullresolution
    section: sdl
    value: 1920x1080
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/__support/app/dosbox_wolf3d.conf
    key: cycles
    section: cpu
    value: 7000
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/__support/app/dosbox_wolf3d.conf
    key: midiconfig
    section: midi
    value: '128:0'
main_file: $GAMEDIR/__support/app/dosbox_wolf3d_single.conf
